paper.title: A Simple and Fast Algorithm to Obtain All Invariants of a Generalized Petri Net

author.org: E.T.S.I.I. de la Universidad de Zaragoza
E.T.S.I.I. de la Universidad de Zaragoza

paper.venue: Selected Papers from the First and the Second European Workshop on Application and Theory of Petri Nets
paper.abstract: After a linear algebraic characterization of the minimal support invariant concept, it is proposed a very efficient algorithm to calculate all the minimal support invariants of Generalised and Capacity Petri Nets.
